item.title: CAn Some One Help Me Switch Safe Into Wildy
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

umm i would go into client.java and switch the checkwild thing so everythings always safe instead of allways wild, and then add in coords for wat u want 2 be wildy

like this

first go under client.java and search for “public boolean nonWild()”

then notice all the coords in there? well those all the coords for safezones, were guna switch the code around a little

after all the coords u shuld c this

|| heightLevel == 1) { return true; } else { return false; } }

look at where it says the true and false switch those so true is false and false is true
make it look like this

|| heightLevel == 1) { return false; } else { return true; } }

then delete all the coordinates in it

this will make everywhere a safezone
now 2 make it a place where you can fight other players 

(absX >= COORD OF SOUTHWEST CORNER X && absX <= COORD OF NORTHEAST CORNER X && absY >= COORD OF SOUTHWEST CORNER Y && absY <= COORD OF NORTHEAST CORNER Y)

say u want edgy bank a pking area
you wuld add this in

(absX >= 3091 && absX <= 3098 && absY >= 3488 && absY <= 3499)

and that will make it so u can pk in edgy bank only

change the coords if u want

this is also a way 2 clear up some of client.java about 50 lines of it

Read full topic
item.source: CAn Some One Help Me Switch Safe Into Wildy
